words.definition: A machine that moves air to cool you down
An animal that lives in water and has fins
A small animal that hops and lives near water
A wild animal with a bushy tail
The part of your body you stand on
A sweet fruit with many seeds
A fish's body part that helps it swim
A place where animals are raised and crops are grown
A tool with points used to eat food
The front part of your head with eyes, nose, and mouth
